name: Brand Tokens
slogan: Tokenize your brand, reward your customers
description:
Brand Tokens platform allows for issuing brand loyalty tokens on the Blockchain. Unlike loyalty points, tokens are valued in real-time and can be traded and transferred between users. Brands can reward their clients with their own tokens, just like with points, users can redeem them for discount, products and services of the issuer or any other partner of the platform. Tokens also enable users to exchange them for cryptocurrencies or fiat if they wish. 

Brands can use their tokens to acquire new customers or reward loyal clients for purchases, for engagement in social media, participation in events or sharing their personal data, etc.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Robert Wesker
team.bioHtml: Serial entrepreneur, passionate with new technology, blockchain, AI, ML, Automated and tokenized everything. https://t.co/hQSHqV64QZ #personaltokens #blockchain

team.title: COO
team.name: Szczepan Bentyn
team.bioHtml: Founder of Personal Tokens and Brand Tokens, Blockchain Influencer/Youtuber, entrepreneur, book author,

team.name: Mohanraj MS
team.bioHtml: 10+ Years experienced in web/mobile app development and worked with 5 startups.

jobs.title: AI researcher who wants to prepare the world for ASI
jobs.description:
We are building a data company, where users can issue their own personal blockchain-based tokens. Those tokens are backed with attention and incentive structures and represent social activity, status, stakes and relations between users. They are being traded 24/7 evaluating reputation, sentiment and potential of issuers. 
We believe that our unique data set is hiding a lot of mysteries that can lead to discover and better understand human nature, help us answer the questions and prepare us for the upcoming Artificial Super Intelligence.  

If you know tools and ways to aggregate social/transactional data sets, and you know what questions to ask please let us know. 

Interested? Throw us a message and let's talk.

Interested? Throw us a message and let's talk.

jobs.title: Blockchain Wizard
jobs.description:
**Blockchain wizard**

üîó Website: https://brandtokens.io

üìç Location: 100% Remote

We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.

Brand Tokens is headquartered in Warsaw.

We are looking for a Blockchain specialist who would like to contribute to a global social platform based on Blockchain technology.

What will I be doing? üë©‚Äçüíªüë®‚Äçüíª

* Smart contract writing

* Audit of smart contracts
 
* Platform integration with external services

* Design, develop, and deploy new systems that enhance throughput, latency, availability, and security

 
What do I need? ü§ì

* Very good knowledge of Solidity 

* Knowledge of smart contracts writing tools 

* Experience in writing smart contracts
 
* Independence, ability to prioritize tasks as well as a desire to develop and share your ideas and knowledge
 
* Good spoken and written English skills
 
* Involvement in the project and willingness to cooperate long-term 

Feel free to apply even if you feel unsure about whether you meet every single requirement in this posting. As long as you're a quick learner, and are excited about changing the status quo for tech recruitment,  we're happy to support you as you come up to speed with our tech stack.¬†

Perks üòç

* Full payment in platform tokens¬†
* Flexible working hours
* 100% remote
* Large development opportunities

Tech stack üî®

Solidity

Why Brand Tokens? üöÄ

We are still in the early stages of our journey. You will be working closely with our users, acting on both their feedback and what our data says. Things you build here will make a tremendous impact on both our business and Brand Tokens as a company.

jobs.title: Brand promoters
jobs.description:
**Brand promoters - different backgrounds**

We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.

We are currently looking for highly motivated professionals to work as Brand Tokens promoters online. We need professionals in different fields, including:
* E-commerce
* Gastronomy
* Retail/sales 
* Automotive
* Communication Technology
* Fashion
* Health and science
* Public and social services

What you will do:
* Initiate, moderate and actively participate in conversations with internet users among different platforms, groups and blogs;
* Search for new ways of communication on a daily basis;
* Think of ways to use the Brand Tokens platform by your field professionals, brands, users. Do you see someone searching for marketing solutions? Do you have ideas on how to make more profit using our platform? Share them with the appropriate people and let them know they should join us!

What we need:
* Good knowledge about your chosen branch of business;
* Amazing research skills and a lot of patience;
* Good knowledge of social media, websites and brands from your field;
* Interest in new technologies and cryptocurrencies will be a plus, but not necessary - you will be provided an introduction and full training before you start working;
* Availability at least 3 hours a day (flexible hours), your own computer and internet access - this is a 100% remote job.
	The form cooperation, salary and all other details will be discussed with chosen applicants. 

Should you be interested, please send your CV, field of interest and information about your availability to our e-mail address: contact@brandtokens.io
We look forward to hearing from you!

We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.

Brand Tokens is headquartered in Warsaw.

We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer with UX/UI skills who would like to contribute to a global social platform based on Blockchain technology.

What will I be doing? üë©‚Äçüíªüë®‚Äçüíª

* Designing and testing computer structures
 
* Troubleshooting system errors
 
* Writing computer instructions
 
* Managing database systems

jobs.title: HR Manager
jobs.description:
üîó Website: https://brandtokens.io

Brand Tokens is headquartered in Warsaw.

We are currently looking for highly motivated professionals to work as Brand Tokens HR Manager.

What will you be doing? üë©‚Äçüíªüë®‚Äçüíª
* You will be responsible for the recruitment process. Most of the ads are already posted, but we will need you to check and change them (if necessary), repost in more sites, where we could find suitable candidates, and keep the ads up to date. You will also pick the right candidates and write new ads when necessary; 
* Create and implement an onboarding process for new employees;
* Negotiate contracts (upon the guidelines provided) and making sure all the contract-related paperwork is in order; 
* You can also propose new career paths for specific positions, think of workshop and presentation ideas, think of who else our company may need.

What do I need? ü§ì

We look forward to hearing from you!

jobs.title: Marketing & sales specialist - worldwide
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.

We are currently looking for sales specialists with marketing/PR experience in various locations, including London, NYC, Tokyo, Seoul, Paris, Beijing & Shanghai. We will consider candidates from any location, as long as you match our requirements. This is a perfect opportunity for a remote, flexible, part-time job. It‚Äôs up to you how much you work - we only care about the results!

We are now building a team of sales professionals to get in touch with brands and present them with our product. You will be responsible for showing Brand Tokens platform to brands and explaining profits from switching to this innovative technology for the brand and its clients. Brand Tokens are dedicated to brands of all sizes, wanting to establish their loyalty programs in an easy, effective and highly profitable way.

Your daily tasks will include:

  • Establishing contacts with new B2B customers;
  • Editing and implementing newsletters and emails;
  • Working with the design and business departments;
  • Building brand awareness and market position of Brand Tokens;
  • Educating customers on new technologies.

What we expect from you:

  • High interpersonal skills;
  • Experience in actively acquiring new customers and selling services and/or products;
  • Experience in conducting business meetings;
  • Very good organisation of working time;
  • Independence and commitment in action;
  • Good knowledge of English in speech and writing (min. B2);
  • Interest in the mobile market and new technologies will be a big plus.

What we offer:

  • Attractive compensation system - commision on each subscription contracted;
  • Long-term cooperation and possible salary negotiation after the initial period;
  • Participation in the development of the global start-up of Brand Tokens;
  • Interesting work and high level of independence;
  • Possibility to improve your qualifications and introduce your own solutions;
  • Flexible working time and 100% remote work.

Apply now!

jobs.title: Project Manager / Product Owner
jobs.description:
**Product Manager at Brand Tokens **
üîó Website: https://brandtokens.io
üìç Location: 100 % Remote 

We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.
Brand Tokens is headquartered in Warsaw. 

What will I be doing? üë©‚Äçüíªüë®‚Äçüíª

* Grow Brand Tokens 's TaaS offering by determining customers' needs and desires by specifying the research needed to obtain market information.
* Develop a deep understanding of our customers' problems and work with a team of excellent engineers and designers to solve them.
* Introduce and market new product by developing time-integrated plans with sales, advertising, and development.
* Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

Skills and Qualifications ü§ì

Product Management, People Management, Understanding the Customer, Product Development, Requirements Analysis, Pricing, Planning, Competitive Analysis, Sales Planning, Inventory Control, Financial Planning and Strategy

Brownie points üç∞

You have experience working with international teams across different locations
Feel free to apply even if you are unsure about whether you meet every single requirement in this posting. As long as you're a quick learner, and are excited about changing the status quo for tech recruitment, we're happy to support you as you come up to speed with our tech stack. 

Perks üòç

* Full payment in platform tokens 
* Flexible working hours
* 100% remote
* Large development opportunities

Why Brand Tokens ? üöÄ

We are still in the early stages of our journey. You will be working closely with our users, acting on both their feedback and what our data says. Things you build here will make a tremendous impact on both our business and Brand Tokens as a company.

jobs.title: Social Media Hacker
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Social Media Hacker:

We are a start-up aspiring to change the world of loyalty programs. We have developed a brand new, easy-to-use and highly profitable way to reward consumers and promote brands - all that thanks to tokenization and use of blockchain technology.

Our goal is to create a special group for coordinated actions in social media and the Internet.
If you have more than one facebook account it is a job for you! If you do not know what Telegram, TikTok or Discord is, do not apply.

Your job will be about what you do every day, except that we'll pay you for it - how fantastic is that?

What we offer:

  • lots of fun;
  • flexible working hours;
  • initial compensation in our brand tokens - the better you work, the more value they will have in the future;
  • possibility of promotion to a leader;
  • possible permanent cooperation and setting individual financial conditions after the trial period.

What we need:

  • Internet access 24/7;
  • at least 2 hours free time daily;
  • fluency in English;
  • online reporting.

This may be the best job you've ever had!

Apply by completing the form:

forms.gle/Hbk5w9kmvuvpWWtJ7
